metadata.description: Betty and Veronica are America's sweethearts... until they turn on each other! When the two BFFs go head-to-head over an issue important to their hometown of Riverdale, all bets are off! Friendships will shatter. Cities will burn. Nails will be broken. Betty and Veronica are back in this ALL-NEW reboot from comics legend Adam Hughes (Wonder Woman, Catwoman)!
metadata.name: Betty & Veronica
